Translations.Text: Mi Iiief Oebbi laaqed n wid iwumi teppunefk Tezmamt: "a p tbeggnem i medden, ur p teppeffrem". Rran p deffir izugar nnsen, u$en yis, ayen irxisen. I icmet wayen u$en
Ur p$ili ad sellken, seg uaaqeb, wid ifeoeen s wayen fkan, u b$an a ten ccekoen $ef wayen ur xdimen. Fellasen aaaqeb aqeoean
N Oebbi tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
Ih, di lxelq n tmurt akked igenwan, akked umgirred n yiv akked wass, d issekniyen i uaqilen
Wid id ismektayen Oebbi s ibeddi, s i$imi, s tueela. Pmeyyizen lxelq n tmurt akked igenwan. A Mass nne$! Ur Texliqev aya d aeerfi. Gedha s yiseK! Sellek a$ seg uaaqeb n tmes
A Mass nne$! Ni$, s tidep, Kecc, Texziv win Teskecmev ar tmes. Ur llin wid ara isellken imednas
A Mass nne$! S tidep, nesla i uneccad, la inecced ar liman: "amnet s Mass nnwen"! Numen. A Mass nne$! Semmee a$ ibekkaven nne$, Kkes ane$ tucmitin nne$, Ssiwev a$, ar ssmae iK, akked wid zeddigen
A Mass nne$! Efk ane$ ayen i a$ Taahdev s imazanen iK; ur a$ Xezzu ass n tnekra. Kecc, s tidep, ur Tzeglev lemaahda
